title: My Pixel 3 phone is not turning up even after following the methods mentioned in Pixel Phone Center
content: My wife’s phone(Pixel 3) was put charging two days back. After sometime when we tried to turn it on, it wasn’t working. Once screen was showed up with google symbol, started there for sometime and again turned off. So we tried to follow the methods mentioned in Pixel Phone Centre. We followed all the steps one by one, still our phone is not turning up. Please guide us to bring it back working.
